heading: 4.1 Graphical Pathway Markup Language (GPML)
text: Graphical Pathway Markup Language (GPML) native file format used store edit pathway models PathVisio share WikiPathways.current GPML version used GPML2021.Please note PathVisio 4.0.0 (uses libGPML) works GPML version 2021 2013a. pathway model written GPML2013a opened PathVisio 4.x automatically converted GPML2021 saved.save pathway model GPML2013a format, please export GPML2013a format.

heading: 4.2 PathVisio File Formats
text: Default file format GPML2021GPML file (.gpml, .xml)Pathway models can exported following formatsGPML2013a file (.gpml, .xml)PDF (.pdf)PNG (.png)SVG (.svg)DataNode list (.txt)Eu. Gene pathway (.pwf)

heading: 20 Themes
text: theme predefined combination colors shapes (data nodes). Themes can applied pathway models, allowing quick easy way change look pathway model.

heading: 20.0.1 Some things to consider
text: Applying theme may cause undesired changes.Users may choose ‚ÄúPreview‚Äù theme applying .Immediately theme applied, can still removed ‚ÄúUndo.‚Äùuser may need manually edit pathway model achieve desired look.Users free choose colors, please aware recommended default colors shapes data nodes.

heading: 20.1 WikiPathways Theme
text:
WikiPathways Theme recommended theme pathway model components (especially data nodes) created colors defined WikiPathways Website Style. colors always also WikiPathways Palette, see Color Palettes.WikiPathways Theme applied pathway model, data node graphics color shape type set default values!Molecular data nodes rectangles
Concept data nodes rounded rectangles (except Alias data nodes)
Figure 20.1: default color(text, border, fill) shape data nodes according WikiPathways Theme

heading: 20.1.1 An Example
text:
figure , see pathway Hijack ubiquitination SARS-CoV-2 (Homo sapiens) WikiPathways Theme applied - left, right.
Figure 20.2: Pathway (left) (right) WikiPathways Theme applied
resulting Blue (metabolite), Green (Pathway), Gray (Group) slightly different particular shades defined WikiPathways Style. original blue, green, gray colors typical Pathvisio 3.x. PathVisio 4.x new default colors match WikiPathways.case Orf10 protein, creator pathway originally chosen round pink shape indicate protein SARS-CoV-2 rather Homo Sapiens. However, WikiPathway Theme defines data nodes type protein black rectangles. recover appearance Orf10, creator may choose manually edit pathway model.Another change shape Pevonedistat rounded rectangle rectangle, data node type Metabolite.
